text: A.S.D. F.C. Bassano Romano is an Italian association football club located in Bassano Romano, Lazio. Having surrendered the title of Serie D, it currently plays in Terza Categoria, the lowest level of the Italian football. Its colors are red and blue. ==External links== * Official homepage Category:Football clubs in Italy Category:Association football clubs established in 1962 Category:Football clubs in Lazio Category:1962 establishments in Italy
title: A.S.D. F.C. Bassano Romano
